actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to exempt any vehicle used by a unit of local government for the purpose of extinguishing fires from overall gross weight limitations generally applicable to vehicles using the Interstate System.

summary.text: Exempts from gross weight limitations generally applicable to vehicles using the Interstate System any vehicle used by a unit of local government for the purpose of extinguishing fires.

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to exempt any vehicle used by a unit of local government for the purpose of extinguishing fires from overall gross weight limitations generally applicable to vehicles using the Interstate System.
